segments.text: Yes . I want to make a plane reservation to Shanghai , China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Feynman Black . I want to leave on October 15th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Let me see . Air China has a flight on October 15th at 10:00 in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I need an economy ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Economy fare for single ticket from New York to Beijing is 400 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Here you are . Is my ticket confirmed then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Please arrive at the airport one hour before departure .
segments.speaker: S1
